attributes.action: use the 2009 budget to provide savers and those on fixed incomes(eg pensioners) with a guaranteed interest rate equal to the rate offered by those institutions to borrowers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst borrowers have benefitted from reductions in interest rates, savers, upon whom the banks rely for a large percentage of their cash holdings to provide corporate and private loans, have suffered greatly.
If the Government are using taxpayers money to re-finance the banks, interest rates for savers should be equal to those offered to borrowers.
